members.name: Matt Swigart
members.title: Founder & Executive Director
members.bio: Over 20 years of ministry experience in local church and parachurch settings. Passionate about developing healthy leaders.

members.name: Adrianna Frelich
members.title: Marketing Director
members.bio: 11 years in corporate marketing with a passion for aligning strategy with purpose. Fosters partnerships between business and nonprofits to create lasting Kingdom impact.

members.name: Tait Hoglund
members.title: Board President
members.bio: 19 years leading and coaching across church, nonprofit, and camp settings. Committed to helping ministry leaders thrive through healthy rhythms and accountability.

members.name: C.J. Lloyd
members.title: Board Treasurer
members.bio: Co-Founder of APEX Accounting Solutions with a passion for financial clarity. Brings expertise in financial stewardship and strategic planning to support the mission.

members.name: Cam Fair
members.title: Board Secretary
members.bio: Attorney in the Twin Cities with a heart for ministry and the local church. Brings legal expertise and a passion for equipping leaders to serve with integrity.
